text: visvasaya tæbuvangenge hrdayan allahvada, ohu pahala karana lada satya (ayavan)da sita biya vi vevlana kalaya (tavamat) pæminiye nædda? movunta pera dharmaya laba denu læbu aya men movunda pat noviya yutuya. (mesema) ovun kerehi ek kalayak giya pasu ovunge hrdayan gal bavata pat viya. ovungen vædi deneku papatarayan bavata pat vuha
